plot: Documentary on Xavier Magnée, defense lawyer of Marc Dutroux, the Belgian who is charged for rape of minors, murdering several girls as well as his alleged accomplice. The film concentrates on how a man can represent the "devil".
title: L'avocat du diable
plot_es: Documentary on Xavier Magnée, defense lawyer of Marc Dutroux, the Belgian who is charged for rape of minors, murdering several girls as well as his alleged accomplice. The film concentrates on how a man can represent the "devil".
plot_en: Documentary on Xavier Magnée, defense lawyer of Marc Dutroux, the Belgian who is charged for rape of minors, murdering several girls as well as his alleged accomplice. The film concentrates on how a man can represent the "devil".
